name: Bomber Dudes
description:
Bomber Dudes is a classic Bomberman inspired game where you can bomb zombies and your friends!

Bomber Dudes has a single player campaign where you must destroy all the zombies and find the key to exit each level.

You can also play a growing number of community generated levels in single player mode.

Play against your friends with local multiplayer support and a variety of battle mode maps.

Bomber Dudes also supports online multiplayer so you can play against your friends and other members of the community.

There is also a level editor where you can create new levels to share with the community.
